page.title: 15WHAT YOU CAN DO IN NONINGTON
page.content: On Sunday morning there is a Sunday School at the Baptist Chapel. There is a service until 10,55 and then you do some work. Every year the Sunday School go on an outing to Broadstairs. The elderly people in the villafe can join the Senoir Citizens Club which meets once a month. There is also a Women's Institute and a Cricket Club. If you do not want to join any of these clubs or societies you can always go for walks in the lovely countryside surrounding the village, or pop in for a drink at the Royal Oak pub at the bottom of Vicarage lane.
